00058         SO_KIT_INIT_CLASS(TShapeKit, SoShapeKit, "ShapeKit");

00061 TShapeKit::TShapeKit()
00062 {
00063         
00064         SO_KIT_CONSTRUCTOR(TShapeKit);  
00065         
00066         SO_KIT_CHANGE_ENTRY_TYPE(shape, TShape, TCube);
00067         SO_KIT_INIT_INSTANCE();
00068         
00069         setPart("shape", NULL);
00070         
00071         SoTransform* transform = new SoTransform; 
00072         setPart("transform", transform);
00073         
00074 }

00087 bool TShapeKit::IntersectP( const Ray& /*ray*/ ) const
00088 {
00089         return false;

00091 
00092 Ray* TShapeKit::Intersect( const Ray& ray, RandomDeviate& rand ) const
00093 {
00094         Trace trace( "TShapeKit::Intersect", false );
00095         
00096         //Test if the ray intersects with this bounding box     
00097         SbBox3f box= m_boundigBox.project();
00098         double t0 = ray.mint;
00099         double t1 = ray.maxt;
00100 
00101     for( int i = 0; i < 3; ++i )
00102     {
00103         double invRayDir = 1.0 / ray.direction[i];
00104         double tNear = ( box.getMin()[i] - ray.origin[i] ) * invRayDir;
00105         double tFar = ( box.getMax()[i] - ray.origin[i] ) * invRayDir;
00106         if( tNear > tFar ) std::swap( tNear, tFar );
00107         t0 = tNear > t0 ? tNear : t0;
00108         t1 = tFar < t1 ? tFar : t1;
00109         if( t0 > t1 ) return 0;
00110     }
00111     
00112         Ray* result = 0;
00113          
00114         //The ray intersects with the BoundingBox
00115         //Transform the ray to call children intersect
00116         SoTransform* coinTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* > ( transform.getValue() );
00117         if( coinTransform )
00118         {
00119                 Transform objectToWorld( *coinTransform );
00120                 Transform worldToObject = objectToWorld.GetInverse();
00121         
00122                 Ray objectRay( worldToObject( ray ) );
00123                 objectRay.maxt = ray.maxt;
00124                 
00125                 TShape* tshape = static_cast< TShape* >( shape.getValue() );
00126                 
00127                 if( tshape )
00128                 {
00129                         double thit = 0.0;
00130                         DifferentialGeometry* dg = new DifferentialGeometry;
00131                         bool intersect = tshape->Intersect( objectRay, &thit, dg );
00132                         if( intersect )
00133                         {
00134                                 ray.maxt = thit;
00135                                 
00136                                 SoAppearanceKit* soappearance = dynamic_cast< SoAppearanceKit* > ( appearance.getValue() );
00137                                 if ( soappearance )
00138                                 {
00139                                     TMaterial* tmaterial = dynamic_cast< TMaterial* > ( soappearance->getPart( "material", false ) );
00140                                     if( tmaterial )
00141                                     {
00142                                         Ray* reflected = tmaterial->GetReflectedRay( objectRay, dg, rand );
00143                                         if( reflected ) result = new Ray( objectToWorld( *reflected ) );
00144                                         delete reflected;
00145                                     }
00146                                 }
00147                         }
00148                     delete dg;
00149                 }
00150         }                                        
00151         return result;  
00152 }
